page.title: 05St John the Baptist Church
page.content: Our village church is called{St. John {the Baptist.}It is much larger than the one the Normans built.{In 1086 {when the first Domesday survey was {done, there was a mill on the site. {The Normans built a small stone church with rounded arches.{In 1863 the old {church was pulled down.}The presnt one is larger. The church has stained and clear glass windows. I like the stained glass window at the front of the church high in the wall by the door. It shows a dove.{A dove is a {sign of peace and love.}Dove are birds of peace because they are in a lot of Bible stories.{They were in the story {of Noah's Ark. {The roof on the outside of the church {is made of red clay}tiles.Inside the church the roof has got wooden rafters.The rafters make semi_circles and{triangles.JO WRIGHT CHARLIE COOPER
